name: Wotek's office Demo1
description:
W,A,S,D/Up,Left,Down,Right.

J,K/A,B

Enter/Start

Right shift/Select

Warning: some things will be changed in the final release.

Meet wotek, the lazy office worker who is always tired, but still keeps he's smile on he's face.

Today he got to he's job as usual, getting inside the building, but nobody is here, and the door is jammed, and he can't break the: Wotek Proof Glass. He must get to he's bosses office and find out what the hell is going on.

Help him solve this ridiculous puzzle, and get him the hell out of the office building. He will TRY to entertain you on the way.

Creator: Labrat11o (Wojtek)

Face  of the game: Wojtek

Every single thing in the game: Wojtek

Support: Jst Shady

This right here is what i call a joke game with class.

~wojtek
